titleStmt.title: Seauen satyres applyed to the weeke including the worlds ridiculous follyes. True fælicity described in the phoenix. Maulgre. Whereunto is annexed the wandring satyre. By W. Rankins, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Rankins, William, fl. 1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edw. Allde for William Ferbrand: and are to be sould at his shop in Lothbury, at the hither end of Colman streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Lothbury, at the hither end of Colman streete
